title: Potato and Leek Soup
ingredients: 3 leeks, white part only, washed thoroughly and sliced
8 medium potatoes, Yukon Golds, or other white
1 cup grated cheese, such as old cheddar or Gouda

instructions.text: of butter in pot. Add the leeks, and cook until a little bit soft, about
Add the garlic, cook a minute longer.
Add the potatoes and stock, and stir in the Dijon mustard and cayenne. You want the potatoes to be covered with about
Cover, bring to a boil, reduce heat to a simmer and cook until potatoes are soft and falling apart, about
Remove from heat. Using an immersion blender, puree until smooth.
Put back on low heat, stir in the cheese until melted.
Stir in milk and cream. Adjust seasonings with more salt, pepper, cheese and if too thick, thin out with more milk or stock.
Garnish with more cheese, chives, and crumbled bacon.
